content: Now that IHE profiles are within the fhir.org/guides/registry (been there since aug 2018)... is the wiki page http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Profiles_from_other_Organizations still needed? I have not been keeping it up-to-date as I have been keeping the source for guides registry up-to-date? This wiki page is nothing but IHE profiles.
should probably replace that page with a pointer to the IG regsitry
then this page could be removed from the FHIR specification home page too.
